author: Staff Reorter
text:
Since January 1 this year, the Employees Provident Fund Organisation has mandated compulsory submission of the Universal Account Number (UAN) when a subscriber files a complaint form, a claim form, or a communication letter.

The UAN can be used by subscribers to avail themselves of the benefits provided by the Employees Provident Fund.

Those members who are out of service and do not hold a UAN may obtain one using the EPFO website.

Revised forms

Employees whose Aadhaar card and Bank Account details have been seeded in UAN and have been verified by the employer can submit revised claim forms without attestation from the employer.
title: Submission of complaints
